popt4jlib.MonteCarlo

Class FastDblArray1ArgMaker

  • java.lang.Object
    • popt4jlib.MonteCarlo.FastDblArray1ArgMaker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RandomArgMakerClonableIntf, RandomArgMakerIntf

    public class FastDblArray1ArgMaker
extends java.lang.Object
implements RandomArgMakerClonableIntf
    creates random double[] objects of fixed length, according to parameters passed in a Hashtable object.

    Title: popt4jlib

    Description: A Parallel Meta-Heuristic Optimization Library in Java

    Copyright: Copyright (c) 2011-2015

    Company:

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ioannis T. Christou

    • Method Detail

      • newInstance

        public RandomArgMakerClonableIntf newInstance(java.util.Hashtable params)
                                       throws OptimizerException
        creates a new instance that can be used without the need for any synchronization when invoked, as different threads own different objects. Notice that the _lastArg data member, if not null, is also deep-copied into the new instance that is returned.
        Specified by:
        newInstance in interface RandomArgMakerClonableIntf
        Parameters:
        p - Hashtable must contain the following params:
        • <"mcs.arglength", $integer_value$> mandatory, the length of the argument.
        • <"mcs.minargvalue", $value$> mandatory, the minimum value for any arg. element.
        • <"mcs.minargvalue$i$", $value$> optional, the minimum value for the i-th element in the argument ($i$ must be in the range {0,...,arg_length-1}. If this value is less than the global value specified by the "mcs.minargvalue" key, it is ignored.
        • <"mcs.maxargvalue", $value$> mandatory, the maximum value for any element in the argument.
        • <"mcs.maxargvalue$i$", $value$> optional, the maximum value for the i-th element in the argument ($i$ must be in the range {0,...,arg_length-1}. If this value is greater than the global value specified by the "mcs.maxargvalue" key, it is ignored.
        • <"thread.id",$integer_value"> mandatory, the (internal) id of the thread invoking this method; this number is used so as to look-up the right random-number generator associated with the current thread.
        Returns:
        FastDblArray1ArgMaker new instance according to the params passed in
        Throws:
        OptimizerException - if any of the params above are incorrectly set

      • createRandomArgument

        public java.lang.Object createRandomArgument(java.util.Hashtable params)
                                      throws OptimizerException
        creates fixed-length double[] objects, according to the params passed in the invocation newInstance(params); that created this object. As a side-effect, the created double[] random vector is also stored in the _lastArg data member, so it can be retrieved by a call to getCurrentArgument().
        Specified by:
        createRandomArgument in interface RandomArgMakerIntf
        Parameters:
        params - Hashtable unused
        Returns:
        Object double[].
        Throws:
        OptimizerException

      • getCurrentArgument

        public java.lang.Object getCurrentArgument()
        returns the argument held in the _lastArg data member, where the last argument created by createRandomArgument(unused) is stored.
        Specified by:
        getCurrentArgument in interface RandomArgMakerClonableIntf
        Returns:
        Object double[]
